name: Geo Shaper
description:
A little runner/puzzle game i made for the Pot-au-jeu Game Jam by Atomium

It's my first game jam alone so there is a lot of problems but i managed to do it all by myself except for the sound effects  i used CasualGameSounds.

Controls :

Left and right arrow key to move

Down arrow key to change shape

Up arrow key to use the shape skill
